name: Linear Agent
description: Linear integration with OAuth support, agent pipeline, and webhook-driven AI agent lifecycle

redirectUri.description: Linear OAuth Redirect URI (optional, defaults to gateway URL)

accessToken.description: Linear API access token for agent activities

defaultAgentId.description: OpenClaw agent ID to use for pipeline stages

codexBaseRepo.description: Path to git repo for Codex worktrees

enableOrchestration.description: Allow agents to spawn sub-agents via spawn_agent/ask_agent tools

worktreeBaseDir.description: Base directory for persistent git worktrees (default: ~/.openclaw/worktrees)

dispatchStatePath.description: Path to dispatch state JSON file (default: ~/.openclaw/linear-dispatch-state.json)

planningStatePath.description: Path to planning state JSON file (default: ~/.openclaw/linear-planning-state.json)

notifications.description: Dispatch lifecycle notification config — fan-out to any combination of channels

targets.description: Notification targets — each routes to an OpenClaw channel

channel.description: OpenClaw channel name: discord, slack, telegram, signal, etc.

accountId.description: Account ID for multi-account channel setups (optional)

events.description: Per-event-type toggles (all default true, set false to suppress)

richFormat.description: Send rich embeds (Discord) and HTML (Telegram) instead of plain text

promptsPath.description: Override path for prompts.yaml (default: ships with plugin)

inactivitySec.description: Kill sessions with no I/O for this many seconds (default: 120)

maxTotalSec.description: Max total runtime for agent sessions in seconds (default: 7200)

toolTimeoutSec.description: Max runtime for a single code_run CLI invocation in seconds (default: 600)
